actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act entitled "An Act to provide for the establishment of the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore."

summary.text: Increases from $27,900,000 to $32,536,000 the amount authorized for the establishment of the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 4600-9)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act entitled "An Act to provide for the establishment of the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore."
